DOC.brief_summary: The study aim determine efficacy oral hyoscine butyl bromide versus diclofenac potassium pain score office hysteroscopy
DOC.brief_title: Oral Hyoscine Butyl Bromide Versus Diclofenac Potassium Before Office Hysteroscopy
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients must perform diagnostic hysteroscopy . 2 . Acceptance participate study . 3 . Signed informed consent . 4 . Not take analgesic ( acetaminophen , ibuprofen , mefenamic acid ) admission . 5 . Absence sedative use admission 1 . Hypersensitivity drug 2. refusal patient 3 . Patients pregnant .
